21-006SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting held Thursday, January 28, 2021.Page 1 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Rock, seconded by Commissioner Dillon, to adopt.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbstain: 1 - Alan Tolkoff2.

21-007SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the City Attorney's Office providing a training on the Brown Act.Erin Weenser-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Gonzales spoke.Erin Weenser-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Erin Weenser-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Erin Weenser-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Gonzales, to adopt.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona Coffee3.

21-008SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Water Department providing an update on Water Saving Projects and Programs.Page 2 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESJames Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Coffee spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.Commissioner Gonzales spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Gonzales and James Mortugia, Assistant Analyst.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Gaytan and James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Berge spoke.James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Berge and James Morgutia, Assistant Analyst.Chair Coffee spoke.Page 3 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Gaytan, seconded by Vice Chair Wheeler, to adopt.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona Coffee4.
